notif.no-clip-for-actor: No clip recorded for this actor
notif.clip-exists: Clip already exists for this actor. Shift click to overwrite.
notif.forge-cache: Overwritten clips can take up to 3 minutes to update in Forge. If you cannot hear your new recording, please try playing back again later.

ui.button-tooltip-record: Click to record. Shift-click to overwrite.
ui.button-tooltip-playback: Click to playback to GM. Shift-click to playback to all players.
